Plot: Carrie White, a shy and outcast 17 year-old girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.
Title: Carrie
Actors: Sissy Spacek, Piper Laurie, Amy Irving, William Katt
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 5 nominations.
